description: Travel, vacations, hotels, tourism, and holiday activities

sentences.english: We are planning a trip to Italy.
sentences.explanation: 'Planifier un voyage' = to plan a trip. 'En Italie' = to Italy (country).

sentences.english: I booked a hotel room online.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: j'ai réservé. 'En ligne' = online. Hotel bookings.

sentences.english: The flight arrives at 3:30 PM.
sentences.explanation: 'Le vol arrive à' = flight arrives at. 24-hour time format.

sentences.english: She packs her suitcase the night before.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire sa valise' = to pack suitcase. 'La veille au soir' = the night before.

sentences.english: We stay at a beach resort.
sentences.explanation: 'Séjourner dans' = to stay at. 'Un complexe balnéaire' = beach resort.

sentences.english: I need to exchange money at the bank.
sentences.explanation: 'Changer de l'argent' = to exchange money. Currency exchange vocabulary.

sentences.english: The tourist guide speaks three languages.
sentences.explanation: 'Le guide touristique' = tourist guide. Language abilities.

sentences.english: We visited many museums during our stay.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: avons visité. 'Pendant notre séjour' = during our stay.

sentences.english: I forgot my passport at home.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: j'ai oublié. 'À la maison' = at home. Travel documents.

sentences.english: The beach is crowded in summer.
sentences.explanation: 'Bondée' = crowded (feminine). 'En été' = in summer. Seasonal tourism.

sentences.english: She takes photos of famous landmarks.
sentences.explanation: 'Prendre des photos de' = to take photos of. Tourism photography.

sentences.english: We rent a car to explore the region.
sentences.explanation: 'Louer une voiture pour' = to rent a car to. Transportation for tourism.

sentences.english: The hotel includes breakfast in the price.
sentences.explanation: 'Inclure dans le prix' = to include in the price. Hotel services.

sentences.english: I buy souvenirs for my friends.
sentences.explanation: 'Acheter des souvenirs pour' = to buy souvenirs for. Gift-giving while traveling.

sentences.english: The cruise ship sails around the Mediterranean.
sentences.explanation: 'Le bateau de croisière' = cruise ship. 'Autour de' = around. Sea travel.

sentences.english: We check out of the hotel at noon.
sentences.explanation: 'Libérer la chambre' = to check out. 'À midi' = at noon. Hotel procedures.

sentences.english: She studies the map before going out.
sentences.explanation: 'Étudier la carte avant de' = to study map before. Navigation preparation.

sentences.english: The travel agency offers package deals.
sentences.explanation: 'L'agence de voyage' = travel agency. 'Des forfaits' = package deals.

sentences.english: I prefer traveling in spring.
sentences.explanation: 'Préférer voyager au printemps' = prefer traveling in spring. Seasonal preferences.

sentences.english: The customs officer checks our luggage.
sentences.explanation: 'Le douanier contrôle' = customs officer checks. Airport procedures.

sentences.english: I compare prices before booking hotels.
sentences.explanation: 'Comparer les prix avant de' = compare prices before. Smart travel planning.

sentences.english: The airline offers direct flights to Paris.
sentences.explanation: 'La compagnie aérienne propose' = airline offers. Flight options.

sentences.english: We discover local cuisine during our travels.
sentences.explanation: 'Découvrir la cuisine locale' = discover local cuisine. Cultural exploration.

sentences.english: I charge my devices before traveling.
sentences.explanation: 'Charger ses appareils avant de' = charge devices before. Travel preparation.

sentences.english: The vacation package includes transportation.
sentences.explanation: 'Le forfait inclut' = package includes. Travel package contents.

sentences.english: She learns basic phrases in the local language.
sentences.explanation: 'Apprendre des phrases de base' = learn basic phrases. Language preparation.

sentences.english: We book excursions through the hotel.
sentences.explanation: 'Réserver des excursions par' = book excursions through. Tourism activities.

sentences.english: The travel insurance covers medical expenses.
sentences.explanation: 'L'assurance voyage couvre' = travel insurance covers. Travel protection.

sentences.english: I carry identification documents everywhere.
sentences.explanation: 'Porter ses papiers d'identité' = carry ID documents. Travel security.

sentences.english: The travel agent recommends popular destinations.
sentences.explanation: 'L'agent de voyage recommande' = travel agent recommends. Professional advice.

sentences.english: We explore the old town on foot.
sentences.explanation: 'Explorer à pied' = explore on foot. Walking tourism.

sentences.english: I purchase travel guidebooks before departure.
sentences.explanation: 'Acheter des guides avant le départ' = buy guidebooks before departure. Trip preparation.

sentences.english: The airport shuttle runs every thirty minutes.
sentences.explanation: 'La navette passe toutes les' = shuttle runs every. Airport transportation.

sentences.english: She packs light for weekend trips.
sentences.explanation: 'Voyager léger' = travel light. Packing strategies.

sentences.english: We attend a cultural festival abroad.
sentences.explanation: 'Assister à un festival à l'étranger' = attend festival abroad. Cultural events.

sentences.english: I check weather forecasts before traveling.
sentences.explanation: 'Vérifier la météo avant de' = check weather before. Travel planning.

sentences.english: The tour group meets at the lobby.
sentences.explanation: 'Se retrouver dans le hall' = meet in the lobby. Tour group coordination.

sentences.english: She experiences jet lag after long flights.
sentences.explanation: 'Souffrir du décalage horaire' = experience jet lag. Travel fatigue.

sentences.english: We sample street food in Asian markets.
sentences.explanation: 'Goûter la cuisine de rue' = sample street food. Culinary exploration.

sentences.english: I download offline maps before exploring.
sentences.explanation: 'Télécharger des cartes hors ligne' = download offline maps. Digital travel tools.

sentences.english: The mountain resort offers skiing lessons.
sentences.explanation: 'La station propose des cours' = resort offers lessons. Mountain tourism.

sentences.english: We reserve seats with extra legroom.
sentences.explanation: 'Réserver des sièges avec plus d'espace' = reserve seats with extra space. Flight comfort.

sentences.english: I learn about local customs and traditions.
sentences.explanation: 'Apprendre les coutumes locales' = learn local customs. Cultural preparation.

sentences.english: The hostel provides shared kitchen facilities.
sentences.explanation: 'L'auberge fournit une cuisine partagée' = hostel provides shared kitchen. Budget accommodation.

sentences.english: She documents her journey through photography.
sentences.explanation: 'Documenter par la photographie' = document through photography. Travel memories.

sentences.english: We participate in eco-tourism activities.
sentences.explanation: 'Participer à des activités d'écotourisme' = participate in eco-tourism. Sustainable travel.

sentences.english: I avoid peak season to save money.
sentences.explanation: 'Éviter la haute saison pour économiser' = avoid peak season to save. Budget travel.

sentences.english: The travel blog shares useful tips.
sentences.explanation: 'Le blog partage des conseils' = blog shares tips. Travel information sources.

sentences.english: We upgrade to business class using points.
sentences.explanation: 'Passer en classe affaires avec des points' = upgrade to business class with points.

sentences.english: I respect dress codes at religious sites.
sentences.explanation: 'Respecter les codes vestimentaires' = respect dress codes. Cultural sensitivity.

sentences.english: The vacation rental has a private pool.
sentences.explanation: 'La location a une piscine privée' = rental has private pool. Vacation accommodation.

sentences.english: She negotiates prices at local markets.
sentences.explanation: 'Négocier les prix' = negotiate prices. Market shopping abroad.

sentences.english: We use public transportation to reduce costs.
sentences.explanation: 'Utiliser les transports pour réduire' = use transport to reduce. Budget travel strategies.

sentences.english: I maintain travel journals during trips.
sentences.explanation: 'Tenir un journal de voyage' = keep travel journal. Trip documentation.

sentences.english: The travel companion shares expenses.
sentences.explanation: 'Le compagnon partage les dépenses' = companion shares expenses. Travel partnerships.

sentences.english: We adapt our itinerary based on weather.
sentences.explanation: 'Adapter selon la météo' = adapt according to weather. Flexible travel planning.

sentences.english: I purchase local SIM cards for communication.
sentences.explanation: 'Acheter des cartes SIM pour communiquer' = buy SIM cards to communicate. Travel connectivity.

sentences.english: The travel warning advises against certain areas.
sentences.explanation: 'L'avertissement déconseille' = warning advises against. Travel safety information.

sentences.english: She exchanges contact information with fellow travelers.
sentences.explanation: 'Échanger ses coordonnées avec' = exchange contact info with. Travel networking.

sentences.english: We explore hidden gems off the beaten path.
sentences.explanation: 'Explorer hors des sentiers battus' = explore off beaten path. Alternative tourism.

sentences.english: I book accommodation with flexible cancellation.
sentences.explanation: 'Réserver avec annulation flexible' = book with flexible cancellation. Booking flexibility.

sentences.english: The cultural immersion program teaches local traditions.
sentences.explanation: 'Le programme d'immersion enseigne' = immersion program teaches. Cultural learning.

sentences.english: We attend cooking classes to learn recipes.
sentences.explanation: 'Assister à des cours pour apprendre' = attend classes to learn. Culinary tourism.

sentences.english: I research visa requirements before traveling.
sentences.explanation: 'Se renseigner sur les exigences' = research requirements. Travel documentation.

sentences.english: The travel diary captures memorable moments.
sentences.explanation: 'Le carnet capture les moments' = diary captures moments. Memory preservation.

sentences.english: She volunteers with local conservation projects.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du bénévolat dans des projets' = volunteer in projects. Volunteer tourism.

sentences.english: We choose sustainable transportation options.
sentences.explanation: 'Choisir des options durables' = choose sustainable options. Eco-friendly travel.

sentences.english: I pack essential medicines in carry-on luggage.
sentences.explanation: 'Mettre dans le bagage à main' = put in carry-on luggage. Travel health preparation.

sentences.english: The homestay experience provides cultural insights.
sentences.explanation: 'L'expérience offre des aperçus' = experience provides insights. Homestay benefits.

sentences.english: We navigate using GPS and paper maps.
sentences.explanation: 'Naviguer avec le GPS et des cartes' = navigate with GPS and maps. Navigation methods.

sentences.english: I tip service workers according to local customs.
sentences.explanation: 'Donner un pourboire selon les coutumes' = tip according to customs. Cultural awareness.

sentences.english: The sunset cruise offers romantic views.
sentences.explanation: 'La croisière offre des vues' = cruise offers views. Romantic travel experiences.

sentences.english: She connects with locals through language exchange.
sentences.explanation: 'Rencontrer grâce à l'échange linguistique' = meet through language exchange. Cultural connection.

sentences.english: We monitor our budget throughout the trip.
sentences.explanation: 'Surveiller tout au long du voyage' = monitor throughout trip. Budget management.

sentences.english: I collect postcards from every destination visited.
sentences.explanation: 'Collectionner de chaque destination' = collect from each destination. Travel souvenirs.

sentences.english: The adventure tour includes extreme sports.
sentences.explanation: 'Le tour inclut des sports extrêmes' = tour includes extreme sports. Adventure tourism.

sentences.english: She adjusts to different time zones gradually.
sentences.explanation: 'S'adapter aux fuseaux horaires' = adjust to time zones. Travel adaptation.

sentences.english: We respect wildlife viewing guidelines.
sentences.explanation: 'Respecter les directives d'observation' = respect viewing guidelines. Wildlife tourism.

sentences.english: I share travel experiences on social media.
sentences.explanation: 'Partager sur les réseaux sociaux' = share on social media. Digital travel sharing.

sentences.english: The luxury resort provides concierge services.
sentences.explanation: 'Le complexe offre des services' = resort offers services. Luxury travel amenities.

sentences.english: We embrace spontaneous travel decisions.
sentences.explanation: 'Embrasser les décisions spontanées' = embrace spontaneous decisions. Flexible travel.

sentences.english: I practice basic survival skills for camping.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer des compétences de survie' = practice survival skills. Outdoor travel preparation.

sentences.english: The road trip reveals spectacular landscapes.
sentences.explanation: 'Le voyage révèle des paysages' = trip reveals landscapes. Road trip experiences.

sentences.english: She maintains contact with family while abroad.
sentences.explanation: 'Maintenir le contact à l'étranger' = maintain contact abroad. Family communication.

sentences.english: We analyze travel reviews before making bookings.
sentences.explanation: 'Analyser les avis avant de réserver' = analyze reviews before booking. Travel research.

sentences.english: I appreciate architectural styles in different cities.
sentences.explanation: 'Apprécier les styles architecturaux' = appreciate architectural styles. Cultural appreciation.

sentences.english: The backpacking adventure tests personal limits.
sentences.explanation: 'L'aventure teste les limites' = adventure tests limits. Challenging travel experiences.

sentences.english: We create lasting friendships through shared experiences.
sentences.explanation: 'Créer des amitiés grâce aux expériences' = create friendships through experiences. Travel bonds.

sentences.english: I document expenses for budget tracking.
sentences.explanation: 'Documenter pour suivre le budget' = document to track budget. Financial organization.

sentences.english: The travel memoir inspires future adventures.
sentences.explanation: 'Le récit inspire de futures aventures' = memoir inspires future adventures. Travel inspiration.
